code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import ProductCard from'./ProductCard';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductList(_ref){let{addToCart}=_ref;const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProducts(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-list",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{product:product,addToCart:addToCart},product.id))});}export default ProductList;
